name: Blood Blossom of the Afterlife
desc: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 Spell/Trap in each GY; banish them, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster in either GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 monster of a different monster card type (Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link) from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Blood Blossom of the Afterlife" once per turn.
